falsificationAttempts.targetDescription: Mandatory critic passes for all tasks may be unnecessary or too costly.
falsificationQueries: Check whether paper.md explicitly mandates probes for all tasks or only ECC/control
Inspect current scoring pipeline to see if probes are optional
falsificationAttempts.falsificationAnalysis: Paper emphasizes probe-derived expert agreement but does not explicitly constrain to all tasks; user requirement overrides for this refactor. Cost concerns remain unresolved.
